---
title: "2019 vs. 2020 graphs"
author: "Ruihieng Jin"
date: "2021/3/9"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = TRUE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
all <- read_csv(here("Nadatrace", "allemissions.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() 

cf <- all %>% 
  filter(!scope == "OFFSETS")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = cf) +
  geom_col(aes(x = year, y = kg_co2e, fill = scope))
```

```{r}
test_df <- all %>% 
            filter(!scope == "OFFSETS") %>% 
            filter(scope == "SCOPE 3")

# test graph
ggplot(data = test_df) +
  geom_col(aes(x = year, y = kg_co2e, fill = category)) 
```
